security: Revealing the establishment of a military cover backstop, including the individual's association with a Joint Operations Group and specific actions taken to maintain the cover (e.g., Army W-2 issuance, form submissions for changes). Disclosure could compromise covert operations and personnel security. Quoting directly: '[X] ASCERTAIN THAT ARMY W-2 BEING ISSUED. (HB 20-661-1)' and '[âˆ‘] SUBMIT FORM 1322 FOR ANY CHANGE AFFECTING THIS COVER. (R 240-250)'.
summary: Notification of the establishment of a military cover backstop for an individual associated with a Joint Operations Group, effective 5 April 1964.
summary_one_paragraph: This document, dated 5 April 1964, serves as a notification of the establishment of a military cover backstop for an individual, specifically Ur. Darben HIDALCO and Palmes N. Jr., associated with an Un Army Element (Joint Operations Group). The notification, addressed to the Chief of Records and Services Division, outlines actions taken to establish the cover, including verifying the issuance of an Army W-2 and submitting necessary forms for changes affecting the cover, referencing file number K-7412.
title: Notification of Establishment of Military Cover Backstop
